TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit WebApplicationLifetimeEvent extends System.Web.Management.WebManagementEvent

summary.span: 表示应用程序的生存期中重要的事件。

span.span: Represents a significant event in the lifetime of an application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET health monitoring 允许生产和运营人员管理已部署的 Web 应用程序。ASP.NET health monitoring allows production and operations staff to manage deployed Web applications. 命名空间包含的运行状况事件类型负责打包应用程序运行状况数据，以及负责处理此数据的提供程序类型。The namespace contains the health-event types responsible for packaging application health-status data and the provider types responsible for processing this data. 它还包含在运行状况事件的管理过程中可帮助的支持类型。It also contains supporting types that help during the management of health events. 应用程序生存期事件包含事件，例如应用程序启动和关闭事件。Application lifetime events include events such as application startup and shutdown events. 如果应用程序已终止，则可以通过查看相关事件消息字段来确定原因。If an application is terminated, you can determine why by viewing the related event message field. 实例发生时，ASP.NET 运行状况监视将更新应用程序生存期 Events 性能计数器。When a instance occurs, ASP.NET health monitoring updates the Application Lifetime Events performance counter. 可以通过将对象添加到配置文件的节的子节来记录这些事件 `rules` `healthMonitoring` ，如下面的示例中所示。You can log these events by adding the object to the `rules` subsection of the `healthMonitoring` section of the configuration file, as shown in the following example. ``` ``` Application Lifetime Events 性能计数器包含所有 ASP.NET 生存期事件的总和。The Application Lifetime Events performance counter contains the sum total of all ASP.NET lifetime events. 若要在系统监视器中查看此性能计数器 (PerfMon) ，请在 "**添加计数器**" 窗口中，从 "**性能对象**" 下拉列表中选择 " **ASP.NET** "。To view this performance counter in System Monitor (PerfMon), in the **Add Counters** window select **ASP.NET** from the **Performance object** drop-down list. 选择 " **应用程序生存期事件** " 性能计数器，然后单击 " **添加** " 按钮。Select the **Application Lifetime Events** performance counter, and click the **Add** button. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [MSDN](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37118)上的 "在 ASP.NET 应用程序中使用系统监视器 (PerfMon) "。For more information, see "Using the System Monitor (PerfMon) with ASP.NET Applications" on [MSDN](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37118). 如果允许标准记录事件 ，可以通过选择**应用程序**日志在[事件查看器](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/windows/it-pro/windows-server-2003/cc756915\(v=ws.10\))中查看事件。If you allow events to be logged by the standard , you can view them in [Event Viewer](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/windows/it-pro/windows-server-2003/cc756915\(v=ws.10\)) by selecting the **Application** log. > [!CAUTION] > 由于 对象是一个大容量事件，因此记录它会占用大量资源，并且可能会降低系统的速度。Because the object is a high-volume event, logging it is resource-intensive and might slow down your system. 这也可能会导致在类发生时 ，由于事件量过大以及事件日志记录的工作方式而导致其他事件被覆盖。It can also cause other events to be overwritten in the case of the class due to the high volume of events and the way the event logging works. > [!NOTE] > 在大多数情况下，你将能够使用已实现的 ASP.NET health 监视类型，并且将通过在 "配置" 部分中指定值来控制运行状况监视系统 `healthMonitoring` 。In most cases you will be able to use the ASP.NET health-monitoring types as implemented, and you will control the health-monitoring system by specifying values in the `healthMonitoring` configuration section. 还可以从运行状况监视类型派生，以创建自己的自定义事件和提供程序。You can also derive from the health-monitoring types to create your own custom events and providers. 有关从类派生的示例 ，请参阅本主题中提供的示例。For an example of deriving from the class, see the example provided in this topic. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何从 类派生以创建自定义事件。The following code example shows how to derive from the class to create a custom event. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Management.WebApplicationLifetimeEvent#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.management.WebApplicationLifetimeEvent/CS/webapplicationlifetimeevent.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Management.WebApplicationLifetimeEvent#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.management.WebApplicationLifetimeEvent/VB/webapplicationlifetimeevent.vb#1)] 以下配置文件节选显示了如何配置 `healthMonitoring` 配置文件的部分，以将 `SampleWebApplicationLifetimeEvent` 上面定义的代码添加到 ASP.NET health 监视系统。The following configuration-file excerpt shows how to configure the `healthMonitoring` section of a configuration file to add the `SampleWebApplicationLifetimeEvent` code defined above to the ASP.NET health-monitoring system. 若要将事件添加到系统中，必须通过将新条目添加到部分来定义事件， `eventMappings` 并通过将新条目添加到部分来将事件映射到提供程序 `rules` 。To add the event to the system, you must define the event by adding a new entry to the `eventMappings` section and map the event to a provider by adding a new entry to the `rules` section. ``` // Configure the connection between the // application lifetime event object // and the provider that must process it. ```

para.span: 格式化要显示的自定义事件信息时，请重写 方法而不是 方法。

span.span: When formatting your custom event information for display, override the method rather than the method.

para.span: 这将避免覆盖或篡改敏感系统信息。

span.span: This will avoid overwriting or tampering with sensitive system information.

related.span: ASP.NET 运行状况监视概述

span.span: ASP.NET Health Monitoring Overview

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数由 ASP.NET health 监视系统在内部使用。This constructor is used internally by the ASP.NET health-monitoring system. 你永远不会使用它来创建类的实例 ，但可以在实现继承自此类的事件类型时调用此构造函数。You will never use it to create an instance of the class, but you can call this constructor when implementing your own event type that inherits from this class. > [!NOTE] > 构造函数不应在代码中直接使用。The constructor is not intended to be used directly from your code. 它由 ASP.NET 调用。It is called by ASP.NET. 从类派生时，可以调用构造函数 。You can call the constructor when deriving from the class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何 在 ASP.NET 自定义运行状况事件中使用。The following code example shows how to use the in an ASP.NET custom health event. 此代码示例主要用于显示要使用的正确语法。This code example is mainly intended to show the correct syntax to use. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Management.WebApplicationLifetimeEvent#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.management.WebApplicationLifetimeEvent/CS/webapplicationlifetimeevent.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Management.WebApplicationLifetimeEvent#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.management.WebApplicationLifetimeEvent/VB/webapplicationlifetimeevent.vb#2)]
